blog.name: jonryamanips
blog.title: Jonrya
blog.description:
An Edit Account For Game Of Thrones
replies by seanscowgirl 🌼

tags: a song of ice and fire
summary: Why Arya Would Be The Perfect Queen.
body:
Why Arya Would Be The Perfect Queen.

“Arya can’t be queen, she’s not feminine or beautiful.” - an actual comment.

Really? I literally saw this in comments on Twitter.

Reasons Why Arya Would Be The PERFECT Queen:

1. She excels in Maths and Science meaning money and medicine are all things she would be able to handle, distribute and control wisely.

2. She, unlike Sansa and Daenerys, has lived amongst smallfolk. She’s been poor and starving and injured with no one to turn to but herself. So she understands the ails of her people. She’ll know how to protect and care for them. She befriends those of lower station and loves them for who they are. They know her and she knows them.

“Don’t allow your men to die for a stranger.” - Ned Stark.

3. She is highly skilled in strategics. She’s eavesdropped on both Tywin Lannister and her Father’s strategy meetings and has picked up many skills along the way. She was also trained by the Faceless Men to assess a situation and figure out the best possible solution for the outcome.

4. She’s battlewise and combat smart. She’s fought large opponents, small opponents, skilled opponents and weak opponents. She knows their tactics, she knows the Westerosi and Braavosi fight patterns and can use that to discover weakness in her challengers. In a battle she’d be unstoppable.

Sansa wouldn’t pick up a sword to defend her people and neither would Daenerys.

“Would they fight for you, if they knew that you wouldn’t fight for them?” - Ned Stark/Jon Snow.

5. Arya doesn’t hate being feminine, She just hates feminine stereotypes. In the books she is mesmerized by beautiful women and their dresses. She even got to know Courtesans who called her beautiful and pretty. Arya has men who lust after her and even the Kindly Man says she has a beautiful face.

“If it’s a husband and children you want, we’ll find you a husband and a face as beautiful as your own.” - The Kindly Man.

She hated her “ladylike.” upbringing because her mother and sister DEMANDED she wear dresses and grow her hair, that she marry a man and have his children, they didn’t let her train or play with the boys. She was practically forced into taking sewing classes and etiquette lessons. She wanted to be herself not what Sansa and Catelyn wanted her to be.

6. She has manipulation and intimidation perfected. This is a good skill to have as it can influence Lords and intimidate enemies.

Sansa doesn’t have this, Sophie will tell you she does but she doesn’t.

“It was an off-camera interaction but Sansa was going to hang Arya until Bran stopped her… he stopped her from gutting their sister and told her what LF did.” (Interview with Isaac Hempstead Wright)

Sansa didn’t figure it out, she was told by Bran.

But Arya? Arya intimidated Sansa, she manipulated many targets in the books and she uses fear and scare tactics to make sure no one crosses her pack.

For the Sansa babies, In 7x06 Arya tells Sansa she learned a game called “The Game Of Faces.” which is what we saw in Season 5. It’s purpose is to make up stories and see if the other believes them while searching for if the situation is actually in the other person’s thoughts. Arya placed Sansa in a situation of “The lords love you, you love the attention and power that gives you, will you betray Jon to get it?” Which in the script it literally says:

“She’s right. Arya knows it, Sansa knows it and we know it.” (Season 7 Script Image)

This proving Arya’s suspicion and leaves a threat in her wake. Which, if you need an Arya Translator, basically meant:

“I won’t let anyone betray my family, I’ll protect it from anyone who wants to tear it apart, even if that person is part of my family.”

So no, Arya isn’t “out to kill Sansa for no reason.” She simply told her that IF she did betray Jon, she wouldn’t be forgiven just for being her sister.

Westeros needs a Queen who is:

Smart: ✔

Cares For Those Of Lesser Stations: ✔

Knows How To Protect The Defenseless: ✔

Has A Strong Sense Of Loyalty: ✔

Cares More For The People Than Herself: ✔

Can Defend Their Stronghold: ✔

Can Prevent Wars That Will Endanger People: ✔

Would Die For Her People To Live: ✔

Arya Stark Would Be The Perfect Queen, That’s A Fact. And To Quote The King Himself:

“Facts Don’t Care About Your Feelings.” - Ben Shapiro

body:
[Arya and Bran after she reunites with Gendry.]

.

Bran: So…you’d be his family, huh?

Arya: Shut up.

Bran: You’d be his lady.

Arya: I will stab you in your sleep.

summary: How is it that you come to own a sword, Arya? Where did you get this?" Arya chewed her lip and said nothing. She would not...
caption: How is it that you come to own a sword, Arya? Where did you get this?“ Arya chewed her lip and said nothing. She would not betray Jon, not even to their father.

blog.name: apiratecalledav
blog.title: You have a good heart. It’s super annoying.
blog.description: Hullo! I'm Av.  You're cool for looking at my blog. I'm not too active these days but it's pretty much all Harry Potter/Fantastic Beasts with a lot of The Dragon Prince, Game of Thrones, The Lord of the Rings, Downton Abbey, The Hunger Games, Girl Meets World, Avatar: The Last Airbender, The Legend of Korra and pretty much whatever else I feel like talking about.

tags: I haven’t been trash for gendrya for a while
summary:
Sansa: So... you and Gendry, eh?
Arya: I have no idea what you are talking about.
Sansa: Please, Arya. I’ve been waiting all our...
body:
Sansa: So... you and Gendry, eh?
Arya: I have no idea what you are talking about.
Sansa: Please, Arya. I’ve been waiting all our lives to talk about this with you. Can’t you humor me for a moment?
Arya: All right. Fine. 
Sansa, giddy: What do you like best about him?
Arya, awkwardly: He’s strong. He’s tall.
Arya, starting to smile: He’s got nice eyes. 
[Sansa beams and nods]
Arya: But my favorite thing is—
Sansa: 😊
Arya: —the way he smashes our enemies’ faces with a hammer!
Arya: 😍

dialogue.name: Arya
dialogue.label: Arya:
dialogue.phrase: I have no idea what you are talking about.

dialogue.name: Sansa
dialogue.label: Sansa:
dialogue.phrase: Please, Arya. I’ve been waiting all our lives to talk about this with you. Can’t you humor me for a moment?

dialogue.name: Sansa, giddy
dialogue.label: Sansa, giddy:
dialogue.phrase: What do you like best about him?

dialogue.name: Arya
dialogue.label: Arya:
dialogue.phrase: —the way he smashes our enemies’ faces with a hammer!

tags: a song of ice and fire
i'll be all over the moon
summary: VERY UNCERTAIN SPOILERS/RUMOURS ABOUT THE SEASON 8 AND ARYA
title: VERY UNCERTAIN SPOILERS/RUMOURS ABOUT THE SEASON 8 AND ARYA
body:
So yeah, I don’t know if this is legit, but I wanted to share this and I want to believeeeee

I found these comments on a Youtube video “ Why I’m NOT Hyped About Game of Thrones Season 8″ by IdeasOfIceAndFire.

Of course, trusting someone on the Internet can sometimes be a silly business… I mean, it would make sense but I’m just afraid of hoping too much and getting too excited like I did with Sherlock 4 (and the hype didn’t help…). What are your thoughts?
body_abstract: So yeah, I don’t know if this is legit, but I wanted to share this and I want to believeeeee

blog.name: winterfellchild
blog.title: The pack survives
blog.description:
"She (Daenerys) has the power to destroy, she can wipe out entire cities, and we
certainly see that in ‘Fire and Blood.’ We see the dragons wiping out 
entire armies, wiping out towns and cities, destroying them, but that 
doesn’t necessarily enable you to rule — it just enables you to destroy." GRRM

blog.description: Denver, CO (displaced New Yorker) - Uber geek, prog-rock fan, hockey fan, food fan, ample redhead fan, Democrat, husband and father. EXTREMELY Anti-Trump since 1983. My blog is slightly schizophrenic, and NSFW within acceptable post-Tumbpocalypse parameters. Disclaimer: Content is mined elsewhere, rarely original. Please dm if content is exclusive, and will remove immediately. Where all my censored blogs go: https://epicallyepicepicosity.blogspot.com/
